Class AbstractView

java.lang.Object
main.AbstractView
public abstract class AbstractView extends Object
Abstract base class for creating various view components in a graphical user interface that interact with a TablrManager instance. Provides a mechanism to handle events such as mouse clicks, keyboard inputs, and painting the view.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    AbstractView(main.TablrManager mgr, main.LayoutInfo layoutInfo, main.ViewList viewList)
    Initializes the common state for subclasses of AbstractView.

    • handleDeadView

      public boolean handleDeadView(AbstractView view)
      this method is invoked if view is killed and should be disposed.
      Parameters:
      view - The dead view.
      Returns:
      Returns true if this object is also irrelevant as a result.

    • handleMouseDrag

      public void handleMouseDrag(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      Handles the mouse drag event.
      Parameters:
      startX - The x-coordinate where the mouse drag started.
      startY - The y-coordinate where the mouse drag started.
      endX - The x-coordinate where the mouse drag ended.
      endY - The y-coordinate where the mouse drag ended.

    • handleCtrlZ

      public void handleCtrlZ()
      Handles the action triggered by the Ctrl+Z key combination.

      This method invokes the undo operation.

    • handleCtrlShiftZ

      public void handleCtrlShiftZ()
      Handles the action triggered by the Ctrl+Shift+Z key combination.

      This method triggers the redo operation.
